content.description: Sit start behind tree on two good holds. Move up to good holds, working up and slightly left to a good jug at the lip. Use edges over the lip to pull yourself over the top.
content.location: On the far left side of the Governing Dynamics Boulder on the eastern side. Located on a tall, yellow/orange face.

content.description:
Stand start on two good edges in the upper crack/rail, make a couple tough moves on crimps out left floowing the crack to the jugs around the corner. Finish up by matching on the diving board hold.

You can gym drop or take it to the top if you want to add some spice.
content.location: On the Governing Dynamics boulder. Located on the obvious rail.

content.description:
Start matched on big undercling block with small feet. Make a move to a flat edge, throw a heel out right, and shift over to grab the slopey jug out right and enjoy a fairly simple top-out.

Governing Dynamics Direct variation gets V6 by eliminating the slopey jug out right. Instead, after hitting the flat edge with left hand, set the heel, or just throw with right hand to the jug out left.
content.location:
Coming from the entrance follow the path straight past triple XXX and past a big boulder on the right. You will come to a large boulder with a small overhang on the right and 2 solid cracks going up and left from the middle on the left side with a high ball topout.

The problem is located on the right side on an obvious large white crystal.

content.description:
Sit start underneath High Rail at the farthest right point, and traverse the obvious lower crack. Follow the crack around the corner and finish at the "diving board" feature about 15' off the ground.

You can choose to top it all the way out, but the traverse is where the business is.
content.location: On the Governing Dynamics boulder, underneath High Rail.
